name: "FLOATIES" Fun With Myodesopsias
description:
This game was created for a presentation given by Dr. Chris Fuller,  Area of Focus : Vitreoretinal Surgery, Medical Retina. This presentation was given at the VBS (Vit-Buckle Society) 2023 in Las Vegas April 13-15.  As a known expert in his field Dr. Fuller is often asked to give talks regarding this subject. While Vitreoretinal Surgery is a very serious topic... Dr Fuller's presentations often include some really "FUN" approaches to the subject, including videos and now a mobile game.

For a collection of Dr. Chris Fuller's vitreoretinal surgical 'misses' meticulously curated and preserved for facepalm posterity check out the link below.

https://retflix.com/
